verses.roman:
raghunātha-bhaṭṭa--pāke ati sunipuṇa
yei rāndhe, sei haya amṛtera sama

synonyms: raghunātha-bhaṭṭa—Raghunātha Bhaṭṭa; pāke—in cooking; ati su-nipuṇa—very expert; yei rāndhe—whatever he cooked; sei—that; haya—is; amṛtera sama—like nectar.
translation: Raghunātha Bhaṭṭa was an expert cook. Whatever he prepared tasted just like nectar.
